# solution.Solution { #optyx.solution.Solution }

```python
solution.Solution(
    status,
    objective_value=None,
    values=dict(),
    multipliers=None,
    iterations=None,
    message='',
    solve_time=None,
)
```

Result of solving an optimization problem.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

| Name            | Type                                                     | Description                                            |
|-----------------|----------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| status          | [SolverStatus](`optyx.solution.SolverStatus`)            | Solver termination status.                             |
| objective_value | [float](`float`) \| None                                 | Optimal objective function value (None if not solved). |
| values          | [dict](`dict`)\[[str](`str`), [float](`float`)\]         | Dictionary mapping variable names to optimal values.   |
| multipliers     | [dict](`dict`)\[[str](`str`), [float](`float`)\] \| None | Lagrange multipliers for constraints (if available).   |
| iterations      | [int](`int`) \| None                                     | Number of solver iterations.                           |
| message         | [str](`str`)                                             | Solver message or error description.                   |
| solve_time      | [float](`float`) \| None                                 | Time taken to solve (seconds).                         |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [get](#optyx.solution.Solution.get) | Get the optimal value of a variable with a default. |

### get { #optyx.solution.Solution.get }

```python
solution.Solution.get(var, default=None)
```

Get the optimal value of a variable with a default.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name    | Type                                                          | Description                            | Default    |
|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------|------------|
| var     | [Variable](`optyx.core.expressions.Variable`) \| [str](`str`) | Variable object or variable name.      | _required_ |
| default | [float](`float`) \| None                                      | Value to return if variable not found. | `None`     |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                     | Description                   |
|--------|--------------------------|-------------------------------|
|        | [float](`float`) \| None | The optimal value or default. |
